parameters.length: a numeric vector giving the shortening of the heart muscle strip.
parameters.conc: a numeric vector giving the concentration of CaCl2
parameters.Strip: an ordered factor indicating the strip of muscle being measured.

description:
Description
The Muscle data frame has 60 rows and 3 columns.
title: Contraction of heart muscle sections
reference:
Baumann and Waldvogel (1963) describe data on the shortening of heart
muscle strips dipped in a \mbox{CaCl}{}_2 solution.
The muscle strips are taken from the left auricle of a rat's heart.
usage: This data frame contains the following columns:
